entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Buchans
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:35 PM NST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 28 February 2023
